summary: This mod makes the armor and weapons you make a little bit stronger.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod.

This mod makes the armor and weapons you make a little bit stronger. You can craft it just like normal armor. Now you have an extra boost when you make your own armor. 
The light armor have now +0,3 weight and +3 armor. The weapons from the light armor sets are boosted with +1 weight and +3 damage.
The heavy armor have now +2 weight and +5 armor. The weapons from the heavy armor sets are boosted with +2 weight and +4 damage.
And all weapons have an extra boost from +0,1 speed, +0,2 critmult and +0,05 reach.

please report any bug.

Have fun!
author: Jor250
